I am such a bad signer, do you agree?

While subjectivity makes labeling absolute abilities difficult, what matters more is identifying growth opportunities. With practice, patience, and the right guidance, anyone can enhance their vocal skills. Believe in your potential, and let's work together to refine your technique.
Do you thing I ever be a good signer, tell it how it is?

Predicting the pinnacle of one's development based on a single performance is unwise. Potential lies within each individual, and with consistent effort, passion, and the right support, significant progress is possible. Don't let self-doubt overshadow your aspirations.
